20 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_TENSOR_IMPL_H__INCLUDED
21 #define TILEDARRAY_TENSOR_IMPL_H__INCLUDED
22 
23 #include "TiledArray/external/madness.h"
24 #include "error.h"
25 #include "policies/dense_policy.h"
26 #include "policies/sparse_policy.h"
27 
28 namespace TiledArray {
29 namespace detail {
30 
32 
38 template <typename Policy>
39 class TensorImpl : private NO_DEFAULTS {
40  public:
41  typedef TensorImpl<Policy> TensorImpl_;
42  typedef Policy policy_type;
43  typedef typename Policy::trange_type trange_type;
44  typedef typename Policy::range_type range_type;
45  typedef typename Policy::size_type size_type;
46  typedef typename Policy::shape_type shape_type;
47  typedef typename Policy::pmap_interface
48  pmap_interface;
49 
50  private:
51  World& world_;
52  const trange_type trange_;
53  const shape_type shape_;
54  std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface> pmap_;
55 
56  public:
58 
66  TensorImpl(World& world, const trange_type& trange, const shape_type& shape,
67  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap)
68  : world_(world), trange_(trange), shape_(shape), pmap_(pmap) {
69  // Validate input data.
70  TA_ASSERT(pmap_);
71  TA_ASSERT(pmap_->size() == trange_.tiles_range().volume());
72  TA_ASSERT(pmap_->rank() ==
73  typename pmap_interface::size_type(world_.rank()));
74  TA_ASSERT(pmap_->procs() ==
75  typename pmap_interface::size_type(world_.size()));
76  TA_ASSERT(shape_.validate(trange_.tiles_range()));
77  // ensure that shapes are identical on every rank
78  TA_ASSERT(is_replicated(world, shape));
79  }
80 
82  virtual ~TensorImpl() {}
83 
85 
88  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap() const { return pmap_; }
89 
91 
94  const range_type& tiles_range() const { return trange_.tiles_range(); }
95 
97 
100  size_type size() const { return trange_.tiles_range().volume(); }
101 
103 
108  size_type local_size() const { return pmap_->local_size(); }
109 
111 
118  template <typename Index>
119  ProcessID owner(const Index& i) const {
120  TA_ASSERT(trange_.tiles_range().includes(i));
121  return pmap_->owner(trange_.tiles_range().ordinal(i));
122  }
123 
125 
130  template <typename Index>
131  bool is_local(const Index& i) const {
132  TA_ASSERT(trange_.tiles_range().includes(i));
133  return pmap_->is_local(trange_.tiles_range().ordinal(i));
134  }
135 
137 
143  template <typename Index>
144  bool is_zero(const Index& i) const {
145  TA_ASSERT(trange_.tiles_range().includes(i));
146  return shape_.is_zero(trange_.tiles_range().ordinal(i));
147  }
148 
150 
153  bool is_dense() const { return shape_.is_dense(); }
154 
156 
159  const shape_type& shape() const { return shape_; }
160 
162 
164  const trange_type& trange() const { return trange_; }
165 
167  [[deprecated]] World& get_world() const { return world_; }
168 
170 
172  World& world() const { return world_; }
173 
174 }; // class TensorImpl

179 extern template class TensorImpl<SparsePolicy>;
180 
181 #endif // TILEDARRAY_HEADER_ONLY
182 
183 } // namespace detail
184 } // namespace TiledArray
